title: The city of Qena on the Nile river
description: Situated on the East bank of the Nile River, Qena is the capital of the Qena governorate in Egypt. Urthecast’s 5-meter resolution pushbroom camera captures the vibrant green agriculture surrounding the Nile River and the sharply contrasting sand patterns of the arid desert.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
